parameters.name: ConfigurationId
parameters.description: The unique ID that Amazon MQ generates for the configuration.

parameters.name: Data
parameters.description: Amazon MQ for Active MQ: The base64-encoded XML configuration. Amazon MQ for RabbitMQ: the base64-encoded Cuttlefish configuration.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the configuration.

nested_items.name: Created
nested_items.description: Required. The date and time of the configuration.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The unique ID that Amazon MQ generates for the configuration.

nested_items.name: LatestRevision
nested_items.description: The latest revision of the configuration.

nested_items.name: Created
nested_items.description: Required. The date and time of the configuration revision.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the configuration revision.

nested_items.name: Revision
nested_items.description: Required. The revision number of the configuration.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the configuration. This value can contain only alphanumeric characters, dashes, periods, underscores, and tildes (- . _ ~). This value must be 1-150 characters long.

nested_items.name: Warnings
nested_items.description: The list of the first 20 warnings about the configuration elements or attributes that were sanitized.

nested_items.name: AttributeName
nested_items.description: The name of the configuration attribute that has been sanitized.

nested_items.name: ElementName
nested_items.description: The name of the configuration element that has been sanitized.

nested_items.name: Reason
nested_items.description: The reason for which the configuration elements or attributes were sanitized.
